articles.title: NBA players, coaches comment on scene at Capitol: ‘This is the epitome of white privilege’ - The Washington Post
articles.description: Draymond Green points to a double standard he saw in how Black Lives Matter protesters were treated during the summer, compared to the ease with which supporters of President Trump stormed the Capitol.
articles.content: Crawford was hardly alone in his sense that a racial double standard was in plain evidence, given the ability of the largely White crowd to break through barriers, smash windows and enter the Capitol… [+8474 chars]
